imdb.plot outline: f you can't get enough of Korean music and pop culture, don't miss a single minute of this exciting convention dedicated to fans of "All Things Hallyu"! KCON 2014, held August 9-10, 2014, at the Los Angeles Memorial Sports Arena, features exciting musical performances by the hottest K-pop stars, meet-and-greet sessions with Korean celebrities and panel discussions, including a Viki panel with Dramabeans and Sean Richard on "How K-Dramas Worldwide Influence Food, Fashion and Fans"! K-pop star Eric Nam also hosts the red carpet just for Viki! Look for new coverage of the largest Korean pop culture conference in North America.
imdb.title: Kcon 2014
plot: f you can't get enough of Korean music and pop culture, don't miss a single minute of this exciting convention dedicated to fans of "All Things Hallyu"! KCON 2014, held August 9-10, 2014, at the Los Angeles Memorial Sports Arena, features exciting musical performances by the hottest K-pop stars, meet-and-greet sessions with Korean celebrities and panel discussions, including a Viki panel with Dramabeans and Sean Richard on "How K-Dramas Worldwide Influence Food, Fashion and Fans"! K-pop star Eric Nam also hosts the red carpet just for Viki! Look for new coverage of the largest Korean pop culture conference in North America.
